logo.name: Flintstone Logo
logo.description: A cartoony emblem featuring Stone Age icons and lettering reminiscent of the classic Flintstones TV show.

sections.title: Welcome to the Stone Age Adventure!
sections.subtitle: Your Dream Holiday, the Flintstones Way
sections.name: header
sections.label: Home
sections.content: Experience a wild and fun-filled vacation like never before, where the Stone Age charm meets modern comforts. Join us at Flintstone Holiday Planner for an unforgettable adventure that will transport you back in time - where dinosaurs roam and the footmobile is your ride!

images.name: Stone Age Adventure
images.description: A beautiful stone-age landscape with quaint stone-carved cottages and dinosaurs grazing.

sections.title: About Us
sections.subtitle: The Story Behind Flintstone Holiday Planner
sections.name: about
sections.label: About
sections.content: At Flintstone Holiday Planner, we are passionate about bringing the iconic world of the Flintstones to life. Founded in Bedrock City, we design unique themed holidays packed with nostalgia and imagination. Our mission is to deliver a seamless blend of prehistoric aesthetics and current-day luxury, giving you the best of both worlds.

images.name: About Background
images.description: A collage of Flintstone characters and scenes that embody the thrill of the Stone Age.

sections.title: Our Services
sections.subtitle: Tailored Flintstone Experiences
sections.name: services
sections.label: Services
sections.content:
- **Flintstone Footmobile Tours:** Cruise through our prehistoric park with our unique foot-powered vehicles.
- **Caveman Culinary Classes:** Master the art of Stone Age cooking with our chefs.
- **Dino Adventure Trails:** Explore our dinosaur-friendly hikes and afternoon sippings on Dino Juice!
- **Stone Carving Workshops:** Unleash your inner artisan with hands-on stone masonry sessions.

images.name: Footmobile
images.description: A foot-powered mobile for prehistoric tours.

images.name: Dino Trail
images.description: A scenic trail featuring real-size dinosaur replicas.

sections.title: Meet the Flintstone Team
sections.subtitle: Your Stone Age Hosts
sections.name: team
sections.label: Team
sections.content:
Say 'Yabba Dabba Doo!' to our friendly crew:
- Fred Flintstone: Chief Stone Age Dreamer
- Wilma Flintstone: Wellness and Cave Spa Guru
- Barney Rubble: Tour Guide Extraordinaire
- Betty Rubble: Dino Trainer and Adventure Guide

images.name: Fred Flintstone
images.description: A cheerful image of Fred Flintstone in his signature spotted outfit.

images.name: Wilma Flintstone
images.description: Wilma smiling and dressed in regal Stone Age attire.

sections.title: Contact Us
sections.name: contact
sections.label: Contact
sections.content:
Whether you have questions, need help planning your trip, or want to book one of our themed packages, we're here to help!

**Email:** contact@flintstoneholidays.com
**Phone:** +1 (555) 019-6840
**Address:** 123 Rock Road, Bedrock City, Stone Age

images.description: Map pinpointing the location of Bedrock City.

sections.title: Testimonials
sections.subtitle: What Our Guests Are Saying

sections.content:
